title: Quantum mechanics
description: A quiz related to quantum mechanics.

questions.question: Which is correct?
answers: Quantum mechanics describes nature at the smallest scale.
Quantum mechanics describes nature at the highest scale.

questions.question: Who is the originator of quantum theory?
What describes the wave function or state function of a quantum-mechanical system?
questions.note: The Schrödinger equation is a linear partial differential equation that describes the wave function or state function of a quantum-mechanical system.
